Question: Walmart Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Walmart Inc

Product: Next-Gen Technology Features for Shopping

- Walmart showcased innovative technologies, including Artificial Intelligence (AI), GenAI, and Augmented Reality (AR) to enhance the shopping experience
- Introduced a new “GenAI-powered search experience” allowing users to explore specific use cases and generate relevant cross-category results
- Walmart InHome Replenishment integrates AI to ensure consistent stocking of online shopping carts with the “right items at the right time”
- AR-powered platform called "Shop with Friends" allows customers to virtually share outfits and receive feedback
- Expansion of drone delivery services to 1.8 million additional households in the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex
- Walmart announced a new generative AI search feature on iOS, AI-powered tools for managing product search and replenishment, and a beta AR social commerce platform called “Shop with Friends”
Summary_cn:
沃尔玛公司

产品：购物的下一代技术特性

- 沃尔玛展示了包括人工智能（AI）、GenAI和增强现实（AR）在内的创新技术，以提升购物体验
- 推出了一种新的“由GenAI驱动的搜索体验”，让用户能够探索特定的使用场景并生成相关的跨类别结果
- 沃尔玛在家自动补货利用AI技术，确保在线购物车能够始终存放“正确的物品在正确的时间”
- 通过增强现实技术打造的平台名为“和朋友一起购物”，让顾客能够虚拟共享穿搭并接受反馈
- 将无人机送货服务扩展到达拉斯-沃思堡都会区的180万户家庭
- 沃尔玛宣布在iOS上推出一种新的生成式AI搜索功能，以及用于管理产品搜索和补货的AI工具，还推出了一个名为“和朋友一起购物”的beta版AR社交商务平台
